sentence.Network_en: Did it not symbolize the eternal , unvarying triumph of Good over Evil?
sentence.Network_cn: 这是不是象征善永远战胜恶?

sentence.Network_en: A life of dullness , of drab, unvarying monotony.
sentence.Network_cn: 平凡的, 永远是如此平凡的.

sentence.Network_en: In a country neighborbood you move in a very confined and unvarying society.
sentence.Network_cn: 在乡下,你四周围的人都是非常不开通,非常单调.

list.abs: unvaried - Time Series analysis and forecasting is an important portion of current signal process and economics .一元时间序列分析与预测在现代信号处理和经济学中占有重要的地位.
A life of dullness , of drab , unvarying monotony ., 平凡的 , 永远是如此平凡的.

some linear transformations are adopt in the study of nonnegative-matrix and Z-matrix , and some properties are kept unvarying ( for example spectral , trace of matrix ) .在对非负矩阵和Z-矩阵研究时，必要的方法是对它们进行变换、简化，同时这些变换常常要求必须保持矩阵一些性质（如矩阵谱迹等)不变。
an unvarying or habitual method of procedure ., 恒久的或习惯的程序方式.

entry.tran: 始终如一的；恒久不变的；一贯的
entry.def: If you describe something as unvarying, you mean that it stays the same and never changes.

example.ex: ...her unvarying refusal to make public appearances.

means.word_mean: 1. persistent in occurrence and unvarying in nature;
3. always the same; showing a single form or character in all occurrences;

sentences.sentence: "a street of uniform tall white buildings"

auth_sentence.content: Even the day-laborer chooses always the same unvarying, monotonous black broadcloth.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even the day-laborer chooses always the same unvarying, monotonous black broadcloth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even the day-laborer chooses always the same unvarying, monotonous black broadcloth.

auth_sentence.content: In the hands of lesser musicians, such unvarying arrangements might sound monotonous, but it works.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the hands of lesser musicians, such unvarying arrangements might sound monotonous, but it works.

auth_sentence.content: The setting is a simple, stark white wall and floor lit with clinically unvarying brightness.
